channel.title: Anybody have some array sendkey help?

item.title: Anybody have some array sendkey help?
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

Var
Mooooo : Array[1..2] Of String;
A : Integer;

procedure ass;
begin
Mooooo[1] := 'Red';
Mooooo[2] := 'Blue';
end;

begin
ass
A:=1+random(2)
if A=1 then
begin
SendKeys(Mooooo[A])
wait(5000)
sendkeys(chr(13))
wait(100+random(500))
end;
if A=2 then
begin
SendKeys(Mooooo[A])
wait(5000)
sendkeys(chr(13))
wait(100+random(500))
end;
End.

okay here is what it does, make a an random value of 1 or 2, then if a is 1 it sends the mooooo[1] array, if a is 2 it sends the mooooo[2] array, it sends the key then waits 5 seconds then presses enter, then waits a random amount of time, you can set it to repeat like this,

Var
Mooooo : Array[1..2] Of String;
A : Integer;

procedure ass;
begin
Mooooo[1] := 'Red';
Mooooo[2] := 'Blue';
end;

begin
ass
repeat
A:=1+random(2)
if A=1 then
begin
SendKeys(Mooooo[A])
wait(5)
sendkeys(chr(13))
wait(100+random(500))
end;
if A=2 then
begin
SendKeys(Mooooo[A])
wait(5)
sendkeys(chr(13))
wait(100+random(500))
end;
until(false)
End.

If this is not what you wanted, then please clearly, tell me what it is. I will try and help you as much as possible.

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody have some array sendkey help?

item.title: Anybody have some array sendkey help?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Hey,

I want to make a script that will use sendkeys to randomly send one of the array values and press enter every 5 seconds. So far, I know how to make it say all the arrays at once lol.

Var
Mooooo : Array[1..2] Of String;
A : Integer;

procedure ass;
begin
Mooooo[1] := 'Red';
Mooooo[2] := 'Blue';
end;

begin
For A := 1 to 2 Do
SendKeys(Tut[A])
End.

Can anyone help or link to a script that has that in there? Thank you.

~Ron

Read full topic
